title: Diamond Dazzle Bangle Set - Vajjra Kankanalu
materials: 18K Yellow Gold with Certified Natural Diamonds. The gold features a signature Hyderabadi polish for enhanced luster and durability.
features: A contemporary take on the classic bangle. These delicate bangles feature a streamlined, open-ended design accented with a scattering of sparkling diamonds. The diamonds are expertly set in a minimalist prong setting to maximize their brilliance. The design is lightweight and comfortable for everyday wear.
colors: Warm yellow gold complemented by the dazzling white of the diamonds.
occasions: or as a subtle touch of elegance for special events. Ideal for gifting during Diwali
description: These bangles are a harmonious blend of modern aesthetics and timeless elegance. The natural diamonds add a touch of luxury, while the simple design ensures versatility. The Hyderabadi polish provides superior durability, making this a cherished piece for years to come.
